metadata.Title: STEMP_EPIC
metadata.Authors: Kenneth N. Potter; Jimmy R. Williams
metadata.Extended description: Computes daily soil temperature profiles by layer using the EPIC methodology (Potter & Williams, 1994). It updates surface and layer temperatures from soil properties, water content, fraction of wet days, surface cover (biomass, mulch, snow), and weather (air temperatures and annual mean), with a short-term temperature memory.
